game.name: The Sims 3: University Life
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Create and control Sims by customizing everything from their appearances and personalities to their homes. Then send them off to university where they will enjoy new opportunities, like social connections and career growth. From class activities to major-specific objects, your Sim will find new ways
game.shortDescriptionEn: Create and control Sims by customizing everything from their appearances and personalities to their homes. Then send them off to university where they will enjoy new opportunities, like social connections and career growth. From class activities to major-specific objects, your Sim will find new ways
